Articles.Content:
This is my first Duna orbiter. I used MMI, and mechjeb to do this.

The process of getting to Duna was very slow, like 2 hours long real-team and 101 days in game. This was because I used ion engines (from MMI) which only have 15 thrust but are re-chargeable.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33364[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33365[/ATTACH]
Nice work. Let's build a plane for Duna!
